body.name: L'Oreal Paris EverCreme Sulfate Free Shampoo for Dry Hair, Triple Action Hydration for Dry, Brittle or Color Treated Hair, with Apricot Oil, 8.5 Fl; Oz (Pack of 1) (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 18 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Sulfate-Free Shampoo For Dry Hair: EverCreme Deep Nourish Shampoo gently cleanses dry, brittle hair with deep moisture for silky-soft texture and shine without weigh down; Hair looks healthier after the 1st use

Nourish Dry Hair: Formulated with nourishing Apricot Oil, this shampoo is for dry hair; This formula is sulfate-free, salt-free, and surfactant-free, so it won't strip hair or dull its color; It is especially gentle on color-treated hair
The EverCreme Deep Nourish System: For best results, use EverCreme shampoo and conditioner in tandem, for a nourishing hair care system that deeply hydrates and softens hair

Why Sulfate Free: Sulfates are cleansing agents that help breakdown oil, dirt, and build up on the scalp and hair; But some sulfates can be harsh and stripping; Our sulfate-free shampoos and conditioners are non-stripping and made for color-treated hair
L'Oreal Paris Beauty: A leading total beauty care company based in Paris, we offer innovative products and unique expertise from beauty experts in makeup, skin care, hair care, styling and hair color
body.description: L’Oral Paris EverCreme Deep Nourish Shampoo is a lightweight sulfate free shampoo that moisturizes and nourishes dry hair for silky-soft texture and healthy shine without weigh down. Our shampoo for dry hair is especially gentle on color treated hair. Hydrating Apricot oil deeply conditions and smooths, leaving hair looking healthier after the 1st use. Our formulas are especially gentle on color treated hair.There are no harsh sulfates, salts or surfactants that can strip, dull and damage hair. Experience a purely sensorial lush, luxurious lather and a fresh aromatic fragrance that blooms. • Infuses Essential Nourishment to Revive Hair • Sulfate Free • No Heavy Waxes • No Weigh Down Apply to wet hair and massage gently into a thick lather. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with EverCreme Deep Nourish conditioner. Use with EverStrong Break Proof Lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT for thin, wavy hair
reviews.reviewText: My hair is fine and wavy and this shampoo and conditioner does not weigh it down or make it look greasy! Makes my hair perfectly soft and smells amazing. Would not recommend for curly hair types, however.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shampoo for dry hair.
reviews.reviewText: It leaves dry hair soft, silky and full.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sulfate free and nice scent!
reviews.reviewText: I love loreal sulfate free shampoos! I have at least 3 scents to choose from in my shower all of the time. This one has conditioner that is a little heavier, but great for those days when static electricity is more evident! Smells good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars leaves hair feeling soft and nice
reviews.reviewText: I saw this was a dupe to the Redken All Soft shampoo and i decided to try it out! My hair is dyed and I noticed that whenever I would use it, the smell of hair dye would arise even though it was gone since the summer. The conditioner helps the smell disappear pretty fast and it leaves my hair soft. My hair used to get oily after a day but I can go two days without washing my hair (+no dry shampoo) and it still sits and feels clean. Hopefully the hair dye smell was just a unique experience but overall I like it and would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lathers very little so that is good. Good product. Helps my hair a lot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I have used this shampoo for a half dozen years or so and we really like it. We like that it is sulfate free and takes good care of our hair, since we live in a semi-desert environment and we're also both seniors--with hair not as young as it used to be. We appreciate that Amazon keeps offering this shampoo at good prices. It is a bit hard to find these days, with so many other brands and varieties available. We like the tried and true!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon is The best
reviews.reviewText: I have been ordering this product every month( this one & ever curl) and it makes my hair the most shiny/ smells good and it makes my hair very smooth. My last purchase, the shampoo & conditioner were placed diagonally and when I opened it, shampoo leaked all over the place. Not only did Amazon replace my product quick, but they didn’t charge me. Amazon is the only company that truly cares about their customers. I’d much rather shop on Amazon then go into a Walmart that’s for sure. Thanks Amazon!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice smell and lathers, somewhat moisturizing, but doesn't go well with my scalp
reviews.reviewText: For my thin frizzy hair this shampoo is quite moisturizing; couldn't say it will work on more coarse, dry hair. It doesn't `revive` the hair, but along with the conditioner it adds softness and shine, maybe some moisture.Although it states it does not contain heavy waxes and it makes a nice thick lather, I need to use this along with a deep cleansing anti-dandruff shampoo. After 2-3 consecutive washes with this shampoo only I start to feel my hair weighed down and not very clean. If I'm using it on it's own, I need to wash my hair twice if I have used dry shampoo. So in terms of that... it's gentle; but just too gentle.I don't have an oily scalp per say, but I do work out often and I tend to get dandruff easily. Again, if I use this more than 2-3 consecutive washes I get dandruff.It has a nice `oily` luxurious smell, but it comes mostly from the flagrance (of which it has more than oils).The tube doesn't close very all the way, it's easy to make a spill if you are not careful.Overall it's not a bad shampoo for the drugstore, but it's not for me. I will use it up, but definitely not re-buy.
this doesn't have a strong smell for people that can't take the strong perfume smells.. works in easy..

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto pero no son 2 shampoos
reviews.reviewText: He usado este producto por mucho tiempo y mi cabello se siente muy suave. Cuando lo pedí decía que eran 2 shampoos, pero me llego shampoo y acondicionador. Igual me los voy a quedar porque ambos son buenos pero si estas buscando 2 shampoos toma esto en consideración.
The media could not be loaded.

Es un buen shampoo y huele riquísimo.Se me acabo mi shampoo profesional en plena cuarentena, empecé a usar uno del súper pero no me dejaban igual de suave el pelo además de que me lo pinte y necesitaba uno libre de sulfatos, probé con este y me deja el cabello muy bonito y brillante.Se siente súper suave aún después de teñirlo.

reviews.reviewTitle: The only brand of shampoo I use
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the "Ever" brand of shampoo for the last number of years. I am in my mid 60's, so my hair is not as naturally healthy looking like someone considerably younger. I find theseshampoos and conditioners help keep my hair soft, shiny and manageable. There is a scent to this particular brand "EverCreme", but I do not find it overpowering.
